description: The '''Bonzo Dog Doo-Dah Band''' (also known as '''the Bonzo Dog Band''' or '''the Bonzos''') was created by a group of British [[Art school|art-school]] students in the 1960s. Combining elements of [[music hall]], [[trad jazz]] and [[psychedelic music|psychedelia]] with [[surreal humour]] and [[avant-garde]] art, the Bonzos came to public attention through appearances in [[the Beatles]]' 1967 film ''[[Magical Mystery Tour (film)|Magical Mystery Tour]]'' and the 1968 [[ITV (TV network)|ITV]] comedy show ''[[Do Not Adjust Your Set]].''
